title: Guacamole With Roasted Garlic Recipe
full_text:
Guacamole With Roasted Garlic Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
45 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
50 mins
Serves
8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
whole
head
garlic
2
tablespoons
olive oil
1
recipe
Best Basic
Guacamole
Directions
Preheat oven to 350°F. Cut top of head off of garlic to expose tops of cloves. Rub all over with olive oil and place on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Roast until garlic is completely soft and well browned, about 45 minutes.
Squeeze cloves out of head and mash into a paste with the back of a fork. Fold into guacamole and serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
